result.execSummary:
The defendant Heath Wilbur Knudtson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: To be served concurrent to current probation case.  In the event that the defendant is discharged from probation with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent SHALL notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment SHALL be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

miscConds.notes: Defendant to pay DNA surcharge.  Court waives court costs.
Defendant is to comply with any treatment/programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and agent.  Defendant to submit DNA sample.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Heath Wilbur Knudtson

records.addlTxt: fax from clerk of court to probation

John Sacia appears for the State.  Def appears in person without counsel.  Def wishes to proceed without attorney and enter plea.  Court advises rights.  Court finds def KVI waives rights and accepts plea.  Complaint used as factual basis, defendnat found guilty.  Defendant sentenced.

Pre-trial conference on September 26, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Status Conference on October 14, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant, Heath Wilbur Knudtson, appeared.  John Harrison Sacia appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advised defendant of  rights.  Defendant KVI waives rights and enters plea of not guilty.  Matter to be set for PTC and STC.  Bond cont.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 26, 2016 at 10:00 am.  Status Conference scheduled for October 14, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 13, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Heath Wilbur Knudtson appeared by video means in custody w/o counsel. Prosecuting Atty John Harrison Sacia appeared for State of Wisconsin.  AIA set, court sets new signature bond with standard conditions.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 13, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Defendant Heath Wilbur Knudtson not in court.  Taavi Mc Mahon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Stat moves for warrant & forf of any bonds.  Court auth warrant.  $500 cash bond set.
